issue.title: [Java] Implement TypeEqualsVisitor comparing vector type equals considering names and metadata
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6288](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6288). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently when we compare range/vector equals, we first compare vector `Field` by its equals method, in this case, it’s hard to specify whether compare names or metadata.

Implement a `TypeEqualsVisitor` will make type comparisons more flexible like cpp implementation dose <https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/compare.cc#L712>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6288?focusedCommentId=16911895) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5119
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5119>
